title: Exploring the genetics of stem digestibility and biofuel potential in rice
abstractText: Abstracts are not currently available in GtR for all funded research. This is normally because the abstract was not required at the time of proposal submission, but may be because it included sensitive information such as personal details.
impactText: This work helped establish a joint UK Vietnam project with funding from BBSRC and the Ministry of Science and Technology in Vietnam. Agriculture, Food and Drink,Manufacturing, including Industrial Biotechology Policy & public services
